attributes.action: note our displeasure with the high proportion of Cabinet power in the hands of new and unelected Ministers sitting in the House of Lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Brown, our (unelected) Prime Minister has appointed many people to high profile Ministerial positions by simply appointing them to the (unelected) House of Lords. Adonis, Vadera, Mandelson, and now Sugar. Elected? No. Powerful, yes. Undemocratic? Very much so.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
